component.name: Einstein
component.summary: Einstein is an Apple Newton MessagePad emulator

description.p:
Einstein emulates Apple Newton MessagePad hardware, specifically the "N2" platform, originally used by the Apple Newton MessagePad 2000, 2100, and Apple eMate. Einstein can boot and run a copy (not supplied) of NewtonOS 2.1.
Sound output and serial port emulation are also supported.
You need an original Newton MessagePad 2000, 2100, or eMate in order to extract its operating system image in order to use Einstein. Einstein itself can be used for this task.
